title: BeyondTrust Password Safe - Password and Session Insights
description: - This dashboard provides insights into password retrieval and session activity performed on password safe.

definition.content:
**BeyondTrust Password Safe** is a privileged access management solution that focuses on securely storing, managing, and rotating privileged credentials (like administrative or root passwords) used to access critical systems. It automates password rotation, and provides comprehensive session monitoring and recording, helping organizations maintain strict control over privileged credentials.

This dashboard provides insights into password retrieval and session activity performed on password safe.

For more information, see the [BeyondTrust Password Safe Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/beyondtrust_password_safe/).

**Tips**:
 - Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
 - Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

**Note**
- This dashboard is populated using Password and Session Activity logs collected via the [Datadog Agent](https://docs.datadoghq.com/agent/).
- Please follow the **Agent and Event Forwarder Configuration** steps [here](/integrations/beyondtrust-password-safe) to enable log collection.
